comment: Álvaro Daniel Pereira Barragán (Spanish pronunciation: [ˈalβaɾo peˈɾeiɾa]; born 28 November 1985) is a Uruguayan footballer who plays for São Paulo FC in Brazil, on loan from Internazionale. Mainly a left back, he can perform equally as a left midfielder.
name: Alvaro Pereira
